item.title: Estate bins overflowing., 30th January

item.title: Pavement/road edge filled with mud and leaf detritus as not been cleared. Nearby drain blocked causing more mud, 30th January
item.description:
This happened last year too. This has been a problem with leaves not cleared on edge of pavement. From start of autumn One of our residents cleared the pavement of leaves as this had not been done. We are unable to park our vehicles outside property as it means treading into thick mud to park safely in our busy road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cator Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
